document_data.name: ''Shadowflash''
document_data.title: Drow Fighting Styles
document_data.mainbody: The sword was also used in his assassination attempt against [[Eilistraee]].
document_data.Description: ''Shadowflash'' was a short sword of gleaming silver.
document_data.Powers: As the name suggested, ''Shadowflash'' could flash. The intensity of this light was about that of a ''[[continual light]]'' spell. Everyone but Vhaeraun within 70 ft. (21.34 m) who saw this light went blind for two to five minutes
document_data.History:
How Vhaeraun came to own ''Shadowflash'' was unknown. The short sword was his favored weapon. His [[cleric]]s preferred the usage of a short sword too. They often mastered a combat style called ''[[sargh'elgg]]'' with a short sword.{{Cite web
